trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Del Rio
There were no other sightings in Del Rio on or around September 20th 1955
divs: Sighting Detailsi saw one alien in1955 outside of my house for 2 miutes aprox.he was 4 to 5ft. dark gray thin legs and arms and very big head big eyes and no hair ,i was so terrorized speechless,at that time iwas living with my granparents outside of del rio tx. city limits ,one night before a lot of people witnessed severeal ufos over laughling air force 6miles east of del rio tx.my family included...i have seen too many ufos all my life in del rio area,i said nothing because nobody is going to beliveme
Summary: 3 ufos were above my house approx.1000ft.
